primaryOutcomeMeasure: Experiences and psychological effects of implant loss after immediate breast reconstruction
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Biological women
* Age \>18 years
* Have lost an implant after a mastectomy and immediate breast reconstruction

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inability to give informed consent
* inability to speak and understand Swedish
* relapse of breast cancer after the reconstruction
* metastatic disease
* psychiatric co-morbidity.
